thought.text: Let me try a different approach to work with the source code directly without needing to build the full package:

action.command: cd /tmp/tmpenvpl8sw/matplotlib && python -c "import sys; sys.path.insert(0, 'lib'); import matplotlib.offsetbox; print('offsetbox module loaded successfully')"

function.arguments: {"command": "cd /tmp/tmpenvpl8sw/matplotlib && python -c \"import sys; sys.path.insert(0, 'lib'); import matplotlib.offsetbox; print('offsetbox module loaded successfully')\"", "security_risk": "LOW"}
function.name: execute_bash
